Main
We need camera access to let you take photos of your workouts and meals.
We need your location to track your outdoor workouts and calculate distance.
We need your location to track your outdoor workouts and calculate distance even when the app is in the background.
We need to access motion and fitness data to track your steps and activities.
We need access to your health data to track your fitness progress and show you insights about your activities.
We need to update your health data to record workouts and activities from our app.
This identifier will be used to deliver personalized fitness recommendations.
